unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing Buzz: Collabs are King!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing Buzz: Collaborations are King!**

unnormalised: Forget solo acts, folks! The name of the game in social media is collaboration, and brands are *loving* it. From Anjali Shah's fashion label teaming up with local artisans in Jaipur for a limited-edition Onam collection, to Rohan Verma's tech startup partnering with IIT Delhi influencers to promote their new app, everyone's getting in on the act.
normalised: Forget solo acts, folks! The name of the game in social media is collaboration, and brands are *loving* it. From Anjali Shah's fashion label teaming up with local artisans in Jaipur for a limited edition Onam collection, to Rohan Verma's tech startup partnering with I I T Delhi influencers to promote their new app, everyone's getting in on the act.

unnormalised: Why the hype? Well, collabs offer instant credibility and access to new audiences. Think biryani - two great tastes that taste great together! Remember when that footwear brand collaborated with Virat Kohli? Huge success!
normalised: Why the hype? Well, collaborations offer instant credibility and access to new audiences. Think biryani - two great tastes that taste great together! Remember when that footwear brand collaborated with Virat Kohli? Huge success!

unnormalised: Even smaller businesses are seeing the magic. My local chaiwala, Sharmaji, partnered with a food blogger and his sales went up by 30% in a week! Smart move, Sharmaji! Experts are predicting even *more* innovative brand partnerships in the coming months. Keep your eyes peeled (and your wallets ready!). Expect collaborations to drive at least Rs. 500 Cr. in influencer marketing spending this year.
normalised: Even smaller businesses are seeing the magic. My local chaiwala, Sharmaji, partnered with a food blogger and his sales went up by thirty percent in a week! Smart move, Sharmaji! Experts are predicting even *more* innovative brand partnerships in the coming months. Keep your eyes peeled (and your wallets ready!).
